pr_title: [CDAP-12429][CDAP-17463] Wrangler: Warn about problems with column names

timeline.message: [CDAP-12429] Wrangler: Give user feedback and an option to cancel when entering an invalid column name

[CDAP-12429][CDAP-17463] Wrangler: Updated warning messages for duplicate column name and invalid characters in name
CDAP-12429: Give warning for invalid characters instead of ignoring invalid inputs
CDAP-17463: A back-end change broke the Apply button for duplicate names. Remove Apply and only allow cancel from the wanring
